name: Supervisor Wise Production of Pouring
query:
select a.supervisor "Supervisor",a.supervisor_name "Supervisor Name",a.name "Pouring Id",a.heat_date 'Heat Date',a.furnece "Furnece",a.shift "Shift",a.shift_time 'Shift Time',b.item_code "Item Code" ,b.item_name "Item Name",b.pattern "Pattern",
b.quantitybox 'Quantitybox',b.total_quantity 'Total Quantity',b.casting_weight 'Casting Weight',
b.rr_weight 'RR Weight',b.rr_weight_total 'RR Weight Total',b.total_weight 'Total Weight'
from `tabPouring` a
left join
`tabCasting Details` b on a.name = b.parent
